title: ICAI CA Final January 2026 Results: Expected on March 1, 2026!
content:
# ICAI CA Final January 2026 Results: Expected on March 1, 2026!

Ek important update hai for all CA Final students who appeared for the January 2026 exams. The results are expected very soon!

According to recent reports and statements from prominent ICAI Central Council Members, the results for the CA Final January 2026 session are anticipated to be declared on March 1, 2026. This news was widely reported on February 24-25, 2026.

Here's a quick summary:

*   **Examination:** ICAI CA Final January 2026 Session. The exams were conducted between January 5 and January 16, 2026.
*   **Expected Result Declaration Date:** March 1, 2026 (likely in the evening).
*   **Information Source:** This expectation has been indicated by ICAI Central Council Members like CA Rajesh Sharma and former Central Council Member Dhiraj Khandelwal.
*   **Where to Check Results:** Once officially released, candidates can check their results on the official ICAI websites.

Students should keep an eye on the official ICAI result portals for the final announcement and direct link to check their scores.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Visit the Official ICAI Website for Results](https://icai.org/category/results)

*Published on: 25 February 2026*
